Text: Your GEICO DIRECT bill is ready for paymentDear GEICO DIRECT policyholder Thank you for being a valued GEICO DIRECT customer Your policy is about to cancel for nonpayment of premium Act now to prevent cancellation of your insurance protection If you have recently sent us your payment disregard this notification and accept our thanks To review your billing status and pay online click the link below Then login and select View Statement on the menu phsphsmainloginloginunauthjspcidEBNNA If the link does not display via your internet service provider copy and paste it into the address line of your browser Thank you for your business We will continue to strive to meet your needs by offering services that make it easy to do business with GEICO Direct If you have any questions or concerns please contact us at contactus Thank you Tony Nicely Chairman In Texas some Colonial County Mutual policyholders are serviced via the GEICO DIRECT website
